Research, Publications & Patents

CVE-2025-55581

Persistent root-level access via insecure watchdog handling in embedded firmware, allowing attackers to maintain privileged access even after reboots.

CVE.org Write-up

CVE-2025-55582

Insecure file permissions enabling local privilege escalation to root from lower-privileged users.

CVE.org Write-up

CVE-2025-55583

Critical unauthenticated command injection vulnerability permitting remote root compromise without credentials.

CVE.org Write-up

CVE-2025-45784

Hardcoded password logging in D-Link DPH-400S/SE firmware exposing sensitive credentials.

CVE.org Write-up

CVE-2025-52363

Hardcoded root password in Tenda CP3 Pro firmware, enabling attackers to bypass authentication entirely.

CVE.org Write-up

CVE-2025-52364

Insecure Telnet startup via eth.sh in Tenda CP3 Pro firmware, exposing an unencrypted root shell on port 23.

CVE.org Write-up

Patent (Application #201941042219)

System & Method for DNS Data Analysis (Indian Patent Office). Application published 23 Apr 2021; status: deemed withdrawn u/s 11b(4).
